1.content: Your name is Jack. you were born only 2 inches tall. The doctors thought it was a miracle. It was all over the news. people were offering your family money to buy you, lucky for you your parents care about you so they didn't take any deals. But eventually the heat died down and you were able to live your life out as normally as you could. now your just starting high school.
1.title: The beginning

11.content: how do you get there?
11.title: Your dropped off at school

111.content: Your parents let you take the bus because the thought you might be safer with lots of kids. your mom gives you to then bus driver and he puts you in one of the seats without really a care for your safety. To most people its seems as if a normal bus seat, but to you it is a huge expanse of fabric bigger than you had first though. Its then that you realize...
111.title: The Bus

1111.content: You sit there in the middle of a huge ( to you anyway) space of seat. you see the bus stopping at the first stop. The door opens and around five kids hope on. You start to become very nervous and pray that one of them doesn't sit on the seat you occupy.
1111.title: other people start coming on

11112.content: you see kids walking down the aisle past you. BUT...
11112.title: they dont notice you

111121.content:
Who sits in your seat?

Olivia -- A kind girl with a giant butt that's so big she probably won't feel you.

Donna -- A beautiful girl with one problem...she farts all the time
111121.title: someone sits in your seat

choices: You are noticed by a bully
You are noticed by a friendly guy
11113.title: readers choice

choices: Shannons sending out facebook invites right now
James's friends are already on their way.
13.content: Its the weekend!. You also remember to you're delight that your parents are going to be gone the whole time visiting family. You have the house to your self, 'I can do whatever i want today!" you think to yourself. but that's when you remember your 17yr-old sister shannon and 8yr-old brother james arestill here. " Shannon will probably have a party like last time". Being how small you are being around drunken teenagers wasn't always a safe bet. That's still a much better outcome than when James's friends come to stay for a sleep over. Oh how they love to torture you with there feet or butts, the memories of horrid smell returns to you. Hopefully this weekend will be safe.
13.title: its the weekend

131.content: You spend the rest of the day like normal ( watching tv, eating), But then when it starts getting late, someone rings the doorbell. You're sister gets it and to you're dread you can hear her greeting some of her friends and telling them to come in. Within a few hours the whole house is full of them. You're scared that they might do something to you, ( you've had bad experiences with drunk people) so you make you're way up climbing back upstairs.
131.title: oh no

info.brief_description: The story of a poor boy only 2 inchs tall at birth. please add
info.description:
This is the story of a small boy named Jack Keedon. So small in fact that hes only 2 inches tall, and hes been that way all his life. He's 14 and just started high school, what challenges is he going face?

Everything's allowed, even males I've decided, I'd love to add more but I haven't got the time.
